oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lum And Abner Radio Show - 1948-04-06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio broadcast of Lum and Abner on April 6, 1948, a CBS network show, sponsored by Alka Seltzer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lum and Abner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and Alka Seltzer advertisement / (1:45) Lum and Abner show / (11:30) Alka Seltzer advertisement / (12:55) One-A-Day Multiple Capsule advertisement / (13:51) Lum and Abner and Alka Seltzer advertisement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; Lum and Abner (Radio program);
